name: Picksy Level 1-1 Demo
description:
hai! ヾ(≧▽≦*)o
this is a demo for a game about a fairy named picksy flying around and collecting viles and gems! this demo contains the first part of the first level (thats all ive made so far).

more soon to come!

thanks for checking my little game out!  ♪(´▽｀)

keyboard controls:
left: left arrow, a
right: right arrow, d
fly: space, z
restart: r, c

controllers are also supported!
